hooks.command: command -v jq >/dev/null 2>&1 && mkdir -p "$HOME/.claude" && TIMESTAMP=$(date -u +"%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%SZ") && jq -r --arg ts "$TIMESTAMP" '$ts + " - " + .tool_input.command + " - " + (.tool_input.description // "No description")' >> "$HOME/.claude/bash-command-log.txt" || true

if command -v npx >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo $STDIN_JSON | jq -r '.tool_input | if .file_path then [.file_path] else .files // [] end | .[]' | while read -r FILE; do if [[ -n "$FILE" && "$FILE" =~ \.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi; done; fi

if [[ -f package.json ]] && git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then FILES=$(git diff --name-only --diff-filter=ACMR 2>/dev/null | grep -E '\.(js|jsx|ts|tsx)$' || true); if [[ -n "$FILES" ]] && command -v npx >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Running linter on changed files...'; echo "$FILES" | while read -r FILE; do npx eslint "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; done; fi; fi
